body_html: I have added support for pooling on fp16 in b7c4169. I have also added a --use_fp16 option the convolutional mnist model at tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py to make it train using fp16 instead of fp32.
body_text: I have added support for pooling on fp16 in b7c4169. I have also added a --use_fp16 option the convolutional mnist model at tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py to make it train using fp16 instead of fp32.
body: I have added support for pooling on fp16 in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/b7c416926e4d31f7d7a924bfdc97580bf7d44c04. I have also added a --use_fp16 option the convolutional mnist model at tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py to make it train using fp16 instead of fp32.
